recommendations.articulation_assessment: Conduct a detailed articulation assessment to identify misarticulated phonemes.
recommendations.phonemic_hearing_test: Evaluate phonemic awareness using standardized perception tests.
recommendations.individual_plan_update: Update the individualized intervention plan based on current performance data.
recommendations.dynamic_monitoring: Document progress dynamics and compare results with previous sessions.
recommendations.breathing_protocol: Introduce structured breathing exercises to normalize expiratory control during speech.
recommendations.sound_automation: Progress from sound elicitation to automation at word and sentence levels.
recommendations.syllable_drills: Use syllable drills to reinforce correct articulatory placement.
recommendations.speech_tempo_control: Monitor and regulate speech rate and fluency during tasks.
recommendations.prosody_training: Target prosody, stress patterns, and intonation for natural speech production.
recommendations.parent_instruction: Provide caregivers with clear home-practice guidelines and supervision strategies.
recommendations.homework_assignment: Assign structured home exercises with measurable goals.
recommendations.audio_record_analysis: Analyze recorded speech samples for objective progress tracking.
recommendations.difficulty_scaling: Gradually increase linguistic and articulatory task complexity.
recommendations.session_frequency_review: Reassess therapy frequency if progress remains limited.
recommendations.specialist_referral: Refer to related specialists (neurologist, psychologist, ENT) when clinically indicated.
